name: Piranha plant's adventure 2
description:
Instructions:

        To play the standalone  run the executable called Piranha plant's adventure.

Controls:

        WASD/Arrow keys to move.

        Don't crash into the walls or eat yourself.

        Get 12 points to win.

Credits:

        Burger and cheese created by FlameExists#7264

        All  other food created by Zaku#2670

        Death screen image created by Snorl4xxer#7763

       All plant parts created by Baby Space Cadet 🌙 ✨ 🌸#1805

       For the time being I cannot find the author of the victory screen animation, i'll update the when i find them.

       All other assets and code created by me, pesant#5695

       None of the music is composed by me, but I performed it
